function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of contactless systems","Impact":"Reduced risk of surface transmission of pathogens","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and maintenance of contactless systems","Technologies":"Contactless systems, non-thermal plasma technology","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Indoor air quality and contamination hazards","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of pathogens","Mitigation":"Installation of airPHX technology to reduce viruses, bacteria, and mold in the air and on surfaces","Technologies":"airPHX technology","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Lack of safe physical distancing","Impact":"Increased risk of person-to-person transmission of pathogens","Mitigation":"Design and layout of building to enable safe physical distancing","Technologies":"Floor plan design, customized space planning","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management"}]}
